scripts.images-ci: if [ "$(git show $(git branch --show-current):data/repokemon.json | json length)" -ne "$(cat data/langs/us/repokemon.json | json length)" ]; then npm run images; fi

scripts.build-ci: npm run repokemon && npm run gemoji && npm run images-ci && npm run sprite-ci && npm run css-min && npm run changes
